inclusion.criterion: receive temporary pacing wires on both ventricles
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: receive usual care, RV pacing, or biventricular pacing depending on treatment arm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pacing wires will be removed as soon as patients become stable
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: clinical, operative, and in-hospital characteristics of patients will be recorded on specialized forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: characteristics of those that received biventricular pacing will be compared to those that had RV or no pacing
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: inability to give written informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, CVA, and PVD. He is being referred for evaluation of PVD. The patient reports occasional dizziness but no prior syncope or sensory/motor defects.
